Pass this option to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/makeRenderCommandEncoder(descriptor:options:)] to specify that Metal can stitch the work a render command encoder encodes with a prior “suspending” render command encoder.

# resuming

**Type Property**

Configures the render pass to as *resuming*.

## Declaration

```swift
static var resuming: MTL4RenderEncoderOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

Pass this option to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/makeRenderCommandEncoder(descriptor:options:)] to specify that Metal can stitch the work a render command encoder encodes with a prior “suspending” render command encoder.
title: resuming
